thread.title: Vicki Michelle says she still has balance problems after CBB fight - Celebrity Big Brother Reality TV -
thread.title_full: Vicki Michelle says she still has balance problems after CBB fight - Celebrity Big Brother News - Reality TV - Digital Spy

author: Sam Warner
title: Vicki Michelle says she still has balance problems after CBB fight - Celebrity Big Brother Reality TV -
text: Allo' Allo' actress Vicki Michelle has said that she is still having balance problems after being injured during an altercation on Celebrity Big Brother's Bit on the Side.The 64-year old had a champagne flute thrown at her during a row between Farrah Abraham and Janice Dickinson, with Aisleyne Horgan-Wallace and Jenna Jameson also present (September 22). © Getty Images / David M. BenettVicki Michelle "I'm really feeling rough and am having problems with balance," Michelle told The Mirror."I went to my doctor this morning and he said to me that it's a problematic side effect and I could feel like it for six weeks, and even then it could go on."I want to feel well and I'm just not, which is a shame." © Channel 5 The star was attending the Specsavers' Spectacle Wearer of the Year awards on Tuesday evening (October 6)."When I came here tonight I had to apologise to photographers and needed my daughter to help steady me because I'm off balance."I'm still a bit nervous in unfamiliar situations." © Channel 5 It has been revealed that Abraham is suing Dickinson following the row on the show.Police had also previously confirmed that they had issued cautions to both Abraham and Dickinson after the incident.
